languages.text: {n}Рыжий со смешком машет рукой.{/n} "Ладно, идти с тобой в бой и впрямь не зазорно". {n}В голосе его прорезается ревнивая подначивающия нотка.{/n} "Хоть с Ангелом Императора тебе в славе все равно не тягаться".

{n}The red-haired warrior waves his hand with a chuckle.{/n} "Very well. It will be no shame at all to go into battle with you." {n}There is a jealous, taunting note in his voice:{/n} "Even though you cannot hope to compete with an Angel of the Emperor for sheer glory."
languages.original_text: {n}Рыжий со смешком машет рукой.{/n} "Ладно, идти с тобой в бой и впрямь не зазорно". {n}В голосе его прорезается ревнивая подначивающия нотка.{/n} "Хоть с Ангелом Императора тебе в славе все равно не тягаться".

traits.locale_text: {n}The red-haired warrior waves his hand with a chuckle.{/n} "Very well. It will be no shame at all to go into battle with you." {n}There is a jealous, taunting note in his voice:{/n} "Even though you cannot hope to compete with an Angel of the Emperor Angel for sheer glory."

{n}The red-haired warrior waves his hand with a chuckle.{/n} "Very well. It will be no shame at all to go into battle with you." {n}There is a jealous, taunting note in his voice:{/n} "Even though you cannot hope to compete with an Angel of the Emperor Angel for sheer glory."

{n}The red-haired warrior waves his hand with a chuckle.{/n} "Very well. It will be no shame at all to go into battle with you." {n}There is a jealous, taunting note in his voice:{/n} "Even though you cannot hope to compete with an Angel of the Emperor Angel for sheer glory."

{n}The red-haired warrior waves his hand with a chuckle.{/n} "Very well. It will be no shame at all to go into battle with you." {n}There is a jealous, taunting note in his voice:{/n} "Even though you cannot hope to compete with an Angel of the Emperor for sheer glory."

languages.text: {n}这位红发战士笑了起来，挥了挥手。{/n}“很好，如果是和你并肩战斗，这一点都不是什么丢脸的事情。{n}他的声音中似乎带着某种既嫉妒、又嘲弄的语气。{/n}“不过，即便是你，也别指望能在荣耀的赛场上与帝皇的天使一较高下。”
languages.original_text: {n}The red-haired warrior waves his hand with a chuckle.{/n} "Very well. It will be no shame at all to go into battle with you." {n}There is a jealous, taunting note in his voice:{/n} "Even though you cannot hope to compete with an Angel of the Emperor for sheer glory."

traits.locale_text: {n}这位红发战士笑了起来，挥了挥手。{/n}“很好，如果是和你并肩战斗，这一点都不是什么丢脸的事情。{n}他的声音中似乎带着某种既嫉妒、又嘲弄的语气。{/n}“不过，即便是你，也别指望能在荣耀的赛场上与帝皇的天使一较高下。”

languages.text: {n}El pelirrojo guerrero ríe y hace un gesto con la mano.{/n} «Muy bien. No hay vergüenza alguna en combatir a su lado». {n}Un tono de celo y burla se cuela en su voz:{/n} «Aunque claramente sea incapaz de competir con uno de los ángeles del Emperador en cuanto a gloria».
languages.original_text: {n}The red-haired warrior waves his hand with a chuckle.{/n} "Very well. It will be no shame at all to go into battle with you." {n}There is a jealous, taunting note in his voice:{/n} "Even though you cannot hope to compete with an Angel of the Emperor for sheer glory."

traits.locale_text: {n}El pelirrojo guerrero ríe y hace un gesto con la mano.{/n} «Muy bien. No hay vergüenza alguna en combatir a su lado». {n}Un tono de celo y burla se cuela en su voz:{/n} «Aunque claramente sea incapaz de competir con uno de los ángeles del Emperador en cuanto a gloria».

languages.text: {n}赤毛の戦士が笑いながら手をふる。{/n}「いいだろう。お前と共に戦うことは、全く恥ずべきことではない」{n}その声には、嫉妬と嘲笑が含まれていた。{/n}「たとえお前が、皇帝と栄光で比べるべくもなくとも」
languages.original_text: {n}The red-haired warrior waves his hand with a chuckle.{/n} "Very well. It will be no shame at all to go into battle with you." {n}There is a jealous, taunting note in his voice:{/n} "Even though you cannot hope to compete with an Angel of the Emperor for sheer glory."

traits.locale_text: {n}赤毛の戦士が笑いながら手をふる。{/n}「いいだろう。お前と共に戦うことは、全く恥ずべきことではない」{n}その声には、嫉妬と嘲笑が含まれていた。{/n}「たとえお前が、皇帝と栄光で比べるべくもなくとも」

languages.text: {n}Le guerrier à la chevelure flamboyante agite la main avec un petit rire.{/n} « Très bien. Je ne me couvrirai donc pas de honte en combattant à vos côtés. » {n}Sa voix est comme teintée d'une pointe de jalousie.{/n} « Même si vous ne pouvez pas espérer rivaliser avec la gloire d'un ange de l'Empereur. »
languages.original_text: {n}The red-haired warrior waves his hand with a chuckle.{/n} "Very well. It will be no shame at all to go into battle with you." {n}There is a jealous, taunting note in his voice:{/n} "Even though you cannot hope to compete with an Angel of the Emperor for sheer glory."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le guerrier à la chevelure flamboyante agite la main avec un petit rire.{/n} « Très bien. Je ne me couvrirai donc pas de honte en combattant à vos côtés. » {n}Sa voix est comme teintée d'une pointe de jalousie.{/n} « Même si vous ne pouvez pas espérer rivaliser avec la gloire d'un ange de l'Empereur. »

languages.text: {n}Der rothaarige Krieger winkt lachend mit seiner Hand.{/n} "Also gut. Es wird keine Schande sein, mit Euch in die Schlacht zu ziehen." {n}Seine Stimme hat einen eifersüchtigen, provokanten Unterton.{/n} "Obgleich Ihr nicht hoffen könnt, um des Ruhmes willen mit einem Engel des Imperators zu konkurrieren."
languages.original_text: {n}The red-haired warrior waves his hand with a chuckle.{/n} "Very well. It will be no shame at all to go into battle with you." {n}There is a jealous, taunting note in his voice:{/n} "Even though you cannot hope to compete with an Angel of the Emperor for sheer glory."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der rothaarige Krieger winkt lachend ab.{/n} "Also gut. Es wird keine Schande sein, mit Euch in den Kampf zu ziehen." {n}Es liegt ein eifersüchtiger, spöttischer Ton in seiner Stimme:{/n} "Auch wenn Ihr niemals hoffen könntet, dem Ruhm eines Engels des Imperators auch nur nahezukommen."

languages.original_text: {n}The red-haired warrior waves his hand with a chuckle.{/n} "Very well. It will be no shame at all to go into battle with you." {n}There is a jealous, taunting note in his voice:{/n} "Even though you cannot hope to compete with an Angel of the Emperor Angel for sheer glory."

languages.text: {n}Kızıl saçlı savaşçı, pis pis gülerek elini sallıyor.{/n} "Pekâlâ. Seninle savaşa gitmenin utanılacak hiçbir tarafı yok." {n}Sesinde kıskançlık dolu, hakarete varan bir ton var.{/n} "Her ne kadar salt şan yolunda İmparator'un Meleği ile boy ölçüşemeyecek olsan da..."
languages.original_text: {n}The red-haired warrior waves his hand with a chuckle.{/n} "Very well. It will be no shame at all to go into battle with you." {n}There is a jealous, taunting note in his voice:{/n} "Even though you cannot hope to compete with an Angel of the Emperor for sheer glory."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kızıl saçlı savaşçı, pis pis gülerek elini sallıyor.{/n} "Pekâlâ. Seninle savaşa gitmenin utanılacak hiçbir tarafı yok." {n}Sesinde kıskançlık dolu, hakarete varan bir ton var.{/n} "Her ne kadar salt şan yolunda İmparator'un bir Meleği ile boy ölçüşemeyecek olsan da..."
